short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your Roblox website experience, seals included!
short.fr: Améliorez votre expérience sur le site Roblox, en compagnie de phoques !
short.lt: Pagerinkite savo Roblox svetainės patirtį, įskaitant sandariklius!
short.pt_BR: Melhore sua experiência no site do Roblox, com direito a focas!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Roblox website extension (with a seal mascot!) to improve your Roblox experience.

What's new in 2.0:
- The extension has been rewritten from the ground up and tons of features have been added!
For a list of new features, please see https://www.roseal.live/changelogs#2.0.0

Enjoy features including:
- Organize your home page sorts the way you want
- Customize your Roblox headshot and full body thumbnail like you can in the Roblox app
- Change the positioning/rotation/scaling/puffiness of some of your items like you can in the Roblox app
- Community drag-and-drop organization with folders
- Improved experience badges list with the ability to compare progress between 2 users
- Block experiences, avatar items, name/description keywords, and item creators from appearing for you
- Store, import, and export lists of private server links
- View all the developer products of any experience to preview possible microtransactions
- Refreshed home header to greet you on the home page
- Quick actions on your Friends page to unfriend, follow, or remove followers faster
- Check whether you can actually join your friends before you attempt to join them
- View the date of when you first purchased items in your inventory
- View your playtime of any experience in the past 14 days or 28 days (data is fetched directly from Roblox)
- View hidden unreleased/moderated avatar items on the website
- Disable autoplay for videos in experience carousels
- Check the status of your ban from an experience
- Remove individual followers from your followers list
.... and more!

Please note that some features may need to be toggled manually, including experimental and beta features.
See https://www.roseal.live for more information about the RoSeal extension.
long.pt_BR:
A web extension (with a seal mascot!) to improve your Roblox experience.

Enjoy features including:
- Discover filtering to filter through experiences on the Discover page
- Group drag-and-drop organization customization, folders included
- Better badges list with comparing badges between 2 users
- Block experiences from appearing on the site
- Accounts manager to switch between accounts
- View experience developer products and see possible microtransactions
- Mention users/groups in an item description
- Refreshed home header to greet you
- Chat sorts to sort your conversations with your friends
- Remove unnecessary home sorts
- Quick actions in cards on your friends page to unfriend/follow/force unfollow faster

Please note that some features may need to be toggled manually, including experimental and beta features.
See https://www.roseal.live for more information.
